title: I need to create my preferred username before someone else uses it

story.text: On Twitter once you have set your username nobody else can have that same name. This is not necessarily the case in the fediverse.
You can have bob@instance1.club and bob@instance2.club and they can be different people with the same username.
So in the fediverse there is no big need to stake out a preferred username.
